title: Festival Outfit Ideas: Back In Black | Lord & Taylor
description:
We’re putting our best festival fashion foot forward as we head into music festival season 2015 .  Some of our favorite festival clothing has one thing in common - black.  We’re collecting black crop tops, black denim, black maxi dresses, and so much more.  Explore Lord & Taylor’s Design Lab to be back in black and for more festival outfit ideas.  

Shop Now: http://bit.ly/music-festival-outfits
